title: CSE 2421 - Systems I: Introduction to Low-Level Programming and Computer Organization
description: Introduction to computer architecture at machine and assembly language level; pointers and addressing; C programming at machine level; computer organization.Prereq: 2122, 2123, 2231 or 321; and 2321, Math 2566, or 366. Not open to students with credit for 360.
professors: Gojko Babic,Janis Jones,George Green,Eric Frick,Kemal Aydin,Aaron Baxter
